name: EzyMsg
overview: EzyMsg is an online email marketing and database management service that helps businesses to market their products and services more effectively. If you’re looking to send email newsletters, press releases, bulk email product updates or all of the above, our custom-designed, direct email marketing templates, real-time response trackers and user-friendly features ensure you impress your audience and grow your business. We are Australia’s best email marketing company – enquire about our software solutions today.
